profile.title: DATA ADMINISTRATOR ROLE
profile.summary: Designs, implements or monitors and maintains data sets, structured (databases) and unstructured (big data).
profile.mission: Administer and monitor data management systems and ensures design, consistency, quality and security.

tasks.task: Apply standards methods and tools for measuring and reporting on wide set of relevant performance indicators (response time, availability, safety, integrity)
Produce data set procedures and instructions for other analysts or administrators
Monitor and maintain data management systems
Ensure the integrity and security of existing data management systems
Identify, investigate and correct problems or incidents related to data management systems
Provide training, support, advice and guidance on data set issues to other information system practitioners

profile.kpi: Accessibility, availability and integrity of data set
